## Applied Regression

This repository holds example code applied regresion in R from coursework at the University of Minnesota. Assignments and data primarily come from pplied Linear Regression, Fourth Edition  by Sanford Weisberg, available as a book or an ebook from Wiley (ISBN 978-1-118-38608-8).

The course site for this book is: http://users.stat.umn.edu/~sandy/alr4ed/
